TextView.android:text:
OVO CODING CHALLENGE 

Implement a saved jobs RecyclerView to replace this screen.

The new screen will show a signed in job hunter all of the job summaries that they have previously saved.

 - Designs can be found in "CodingChallengeDesign.png"
 - Use `SavedJobsClient.kt` to retrieve the test data
- Should handle pagination and pull to refresh 
- Final solution should have production ready code and tests
- Can use third party libraries if required
